title: Griswold, LLC.
content: From vibration control to shock and impact absorption, sealing to non-skid solutions – you can count on their seasoned engineering team for deep expertise to help you create effective approaches and meet unique functional requirements.Griswold® enlighten-U® – Exceptional Long-Term Sealing and Cushioning PerformanceGriswold’s enlighten-U® microcellular urethane has excellent compression set resistance, predictable hardness, tight thickness tolerances and superior energy absorption properties, perfect for a variety of gasketing and sealing applications in the automotive/transportation, medical, polishing, flexographic printing and electronics industries. The enlighten-U products continually evolve to meet the needs of your advancing technology. At Griswold, the engineering and production teams are flexible and nimble, often working with tight timelines to meet demanding customer requirements.Key Benefits:Breadth of hardnessBroad range of thicknessesEnergy absorptionFlame retardantLow compression setPlasticizer freeGriswold® Sponge – Problem Solving Materials for Slipping, Gripping, Sealing and Vibration ManagementGriswold offers a wide range of open cell, cellular rubber products based predominantly on natural rubber, but also include offerings in neoprene, EPDM, Nitrile and SBR, as well as custom-designed compounds.Key Benefits:Anti-slipBroad range of constructionsBroad range of thicknessElectrostatically dissipativeFlexible formatsTough and durableGriswold® FlameSafe™ – The Solution for Applications Needing UL Approval for Heat ResistanceWith FlameSafe™, designers can now utilize the great properties of natural rubber, like tremendous grip and wear in friction components, with vibration and noise damping properties for applications that require UL approval, such as appliances, robotics, and enclosures.Key Benefits:UL HBF Yellow CardHigh coefficient of frictionNoise and vibration dampingLong lifeUL approved
description: Griswold, LLC. - Your Partner for a Wide Range of Engineered Cellular Rubber
